rows.label: qst103602_msg0001
rows.name: Here you are, young lady.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0002
rows.name: Wow! Thank you!

rows.label: qst103602_msg0003
rows.name:
If I start making it now, I can
finish before his ship departs!

rows.label: qst103602_msg0004
rows.name:
Where is your friend
moving to? Gula, perhaps?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0005
rows.name: No, he said Fonsa Myma.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0006
rows.name:
Fonsa Myma... It is rare
for someone to move to
the Kingdom of Invidia.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0007
rows.name:
He said he and his father are
going to seek... asylum...

rows.label: qst103602_msg0008
rows.name: Asylum...

rows.label: qst103602_msg0009
rows.name:
He wouldn't tell me the
details because he said
his father would get mad.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0010
rows.name:
What kind of person is
your friend's father?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0011
rows.name: I've never met him...

rows.label: qst103602_msg0012
rows.name: Then, what is your friend's name?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0014
rows.name:
It is very difficult to get to Fonsa
Myma from the Imperial Capital.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0015
rows.name:
So, I was hoping we could
help him when he moves.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0016
rows.name: Is that so?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0017
rows.name: My friend's name is Marl Aramiatt.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0018
rows.name:
Even if you see Marl, don't tell
him I'm making a pendant, okay?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0019
rows.name: I promise.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0020
rows.name: Here's a thank you gift! Bye-bye!

rows.label: qst103602_msg0021
rows.name:
You were too harsh with
the child, Wadatsumi...

rows.label: qst103602_msg0022
rows.name:
My apologies... I do not know
how to interact with them.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0023
rows.name:
When Neferu-sama was young,
I was just as harsh...

rows.label: qst103602_msg0024
rows.name: I wonder if I troubled him as well?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0025
rows.name: No, you made him cry.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0026
rows.name:
What a blunder... Unbecoming
of an Emperor's Blade, such
a foolish act...!

rows.label: qst103602_msg0027
rows.name:
I will take responsibility and
return to my Core Crystal.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0028
rows.name: More importantly... the name Aramiatt.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0101
rows.name: Do you remember?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0102
rows.name: I remember.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0103
rows.name: I forgot.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0121
rows.name: As expected.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0131
rows.name:
It's Senator Stol Aramiatt,
whose wife was murdered at
Shamayim Hot Springs.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0151
rows.name:
Then let us go to that person
and ask the reason for such
an act as seeking asylum!
